quote: I believe life is an intelligent thing: that things aren't random.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The beauty of democracy is that an average, random, unremarkable citizen can lead it.
author: P.J. Rourke

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: One sometimes finds what one is not looking for.
author: Alexander Fleming

quote: The true facts are not always obvious. They often have to be looked for
author: O.R. Tambo

quote: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
author: Walt Withman

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
